hanzi-su-wiki:
絞

Значения

Выдавливать; душить, сжимать; быть сжатым, быть задушенным; обвязывать, стянуть

Мнемоника

Связь 交 посредством верёвок 糸.

Варианты

绞
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiǎo
to twist (strands into a thread); to entangle; to wring; to hang (by the neck); to turn; to wind; classifier for skeins of yarn
скручивать (пряди в нитку); запутывать; отжать; повесить (за шею); повернуть; дуть; классификатор мотков пряжи
rtega_mnemonic:
絞絞RS
绞绞		twist, wring, intertwine, winch
  • strings 糸 being mixed 交: intertwine, twist
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 绞)
Pictophonetic: 交 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
絞盡腦汁 [ jiǎo jìn nǎo zhī ]: to rack one's brains
絞痛 [ jiǎo tòng ]: sharp pain; cramp; griping pain; colic; angina, cf 心绞痛
絞車 [ jiǎo chē ]: winch; windlass
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 交 [ jiāo ] to connect; to deliver, to exchange; to intersect; to mix
heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman hates going to parties and having to mingle. He wants to wring someone's neck after just a little small talk.
heisig_constituent: strangle, thread, spiderman, mingle, top hat, father
koohiiStory1: Spiderman hates going to parties and having to mingle. He wants to strangle someone after just a little small talk.
koohiiStory2: At the elegant cocktail party of VIP's, the spy, dressed like everyone else in formal evening wear, sneaks in and strangles his victim with a very thin wire - a thread. Afterwards he mingles in with the crowd and disappears.
jp_example_words: 絞る(しぼる): press, wring, squeeze
jp_readingExamples: 絞まる (し.まる), 絞める (し.める), 絞る (しぼ.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A thread is mixed all around and begins to strangle you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Just imagine thread everywhere, mixing in with everything. It's all around, and no matter where you go you get more and more caught in this thread. Eventually it tightens because you're trying to escape, and you feel yourself having trouble breathing. Imagine the moment when you realize you're getting strangled.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you are strangled you see who set this trap. (What else could it be, with all this thread everywhere?) It is こういち, who just watches you as you lose consciousness, tapping his fingers together.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: In your final moments before you are totally strangled, you think you see a little thread come out of his butt. "I should have done my WaniKani reviews" is your last thought.
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 父 (отец), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese: jiǎo: (глаг/сч.слово) скручивать, выжимать (белье), вить; вешать, затягивать (петлю); смешивать, перемешивать; моток, клубок; плетёный полотняный пояс
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you mix (交) the threads (糸) to wring them out
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Whenver spidey mingles at a party he gets sick of people quickly and just wants to wring everyone's neck.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", " Suo " sound. The original meaning is a rope formed by intersecting and twisting two or more strands. "Book of Rites. "Miscellaneous Notes": "Rings", Kong Yingdashu: "A person who knows the so-called entanglement with one strand, if two strands intersect, it is called a twist." "Ritual. Mourning clothes. "Zixia Biography": "The twister, the rope is also." "Jade Chapter. "Jiaobu": "Twisted, twisted, rope is also."

" Twisting " means strangling, that is, strangling the neck with ropes to suffocate a person. "Said Wen": "Twisted, hanged." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The Second Year of Aigong": "If he is guilty, hang him to kill him." "Zhan Guo Ce. "Qin Ce Fifth": "When the Marquis wants to kill Zhao, Wu'an Jun is difficult, go to Xianyang Qili, hang and kill him." " Hanging " became one of the death sentences in the Sui and Tang Dynasties. "Sui Shu. "Criminal Law History": "There are five criminal names: the first is the death penalty, the second is the death penalty, there are strangulations, and there are cuts." "Tang Law. Death penalty two. "Zhang Zhan Shuyi": "The sitting of twisting and cutting, the extreme of punishment."

" Twisting " means winding. "Jade articles. Itobe: "Twisting, winding." Such as "Mozi. "Festival Burial": "Ge Yizhen, twisted it is incompatible." Liu Zongyuan of the Tang Dynasty <Jin Wen>: "There are strange materials in the northern mountains of the Jin...The roots are twisted in strange rocks, which are planted without soil, and they are the same color as the stone."

" Twist " extends from winding meaning to squeeze and twist. Such as "Guan Yinzi. "Two Pillars": "Wood is a thing and drilled to get fire, and twisted to get water." Jia Sixie of the Northern Wei Dynasty, "Qi Min Yao Shu. Plant Jujube": "Take the thick juice out of the raw cloth and spread it on a plate or pot."

" Twisted " again expressed eagerness. Such as "The Analects. "Yanghuo": "If it is good to learn, it is also twisted." Xing Bingshu: "The twister is also twisted." "Zuo Zhuan. "The First Year of Zhao AD": "Uncle Sun twists and wan." Du pre-note: "Twist, cut."

" Twisting " also means pale yellow. "Ji Yun. Yao Yun: "Twisted, pale yellow." "Book of Rites. "Wang Zao": "Twisting clothes to tie it." Zheng Xuan's note: "Twisting, the color of blue and yellow is also." "Hou Han. "The Biography of Wen Yuan": "Those who have passed the history are ordered to take off their old clothes and wear the clothes of Cen Mou."

" Jiao " is also the name of an ancient country, located in the northwest of Yunxian County, Hubei Province today. "Zuo Zhuan. "Eleventh Year of Huan Gong": "Yun Renjun in Pusao will fight against Chu masters with Sui, Jiao, Zhou, and Liao." "Zuo Zhuan. "The Twelve Years of Huan Gong": "In the battle of cutting down, the Chu division was involved in Peng."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸" to the sound of " cross ". The original meaning is a rope formed by intersecting and twisting two or more strands.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「交」聲。本義是兩股或多股綫相交扭結而成的繩索。《禮記．雜記上》：「環絰」，孔穎達疏：「知以一股所謂纏絰者，若是兩股相交，則謂之絞。」《儀禮．喪服．子夏傳》：「絞帶者，繩帶也。」《玉篇．交部》：「絞，絢絞，繩索也。」

　　「絞」表示絞殺，即以繩索交勒脖子使人窒息。《說文》：「絞，縊也。」如《左傳．哀公二年》：「若其有罪，絞縊以戮。」《戰國策．秦策五》：「應侯欲伐趙，武安君難之，去咸陽七里，絞而殺之。」「絞」在隋唐時期成為死刑之一。《隋書．刑法志》：「其刑名有五：一曰死刑二，有絞，有斬。」《唐律．死刑二．絞斬疏議》：「絞、斬之坐，刑之極也。」

　　「絞」表示纏繞。《玉篇．糸部》：「絞，繞也。」如《墨子．節葬下》：「葛以緘之，絞之不合。」唐代柳宗元〈晉問〉：「晉之北山有異材……根絞怪石，不土而植，千尋百圍，與石同色。」

　　「絞」從纏繞義引申表示擠壓、擰。如《關尹子．二柱》：「木之為物鑽之得火，絞之得水。」北魏賈思勰《齊民要術．種棗》：「生布絞取濃汁，塗盤上或盆中。」

　　「絞」又表示急切。如《論語．陽貨》：「好直不好學，其蔽也絞。」邢昺疏：「絞者，絞切也。」《左傳．昭公元年》：「叔孫絞而婉。」杜預注：「絞，切也。」

　　「絞」還表示蒼黃色。《集韻．爻韻》：「絞，蒼黃色。」《禮記．王藻》：「絞衣以裼之。」鄭玄注：「絞，蒼黃之色也。」《後漢書．文苑列傳》：「諸史過者，皆令脫其故衣，更著岑牟單絞之服。」

　　「絞」也是古國名，在今湖北省鄖縣西北。《左傳．桓公十一年》：「鄖人軍於蒲騷，將與隨、絞、州、蓼伐楚師。」《左傳．桓公十二年》：「伐絞之役，楚師分涉於彭。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「交」聲。本義是兩股或多股綫相交扭結而成的繩索。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
絞 (Simplified: 绞)
Pinyin: jiǎo
English Definition: to twist (strands into a thread); to entangle; to wring; to hang (by the neck); to turn; to wind; classifier for skeins of yarn
Total strokes: 12; Radical: 糸
Pictophonetic: 交 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 交 [ jiāo ] to connect; to deliver, to exchange; to intersect; to mix
Example Words:
絞盡腦汁 [ jiǎo jìn nǎo zhī ]: to rack one's brains
絞痛 [ jiǎo tòng ]: sharp pain; cramp; griping pain; colic; angina, cf 心绞痛
絞車 [ jiǎo chē ]: winch; windlass
More: 絞* | *絞 | *絞*

    • 交 [ jiāo ] to connect; to deliver, to exchange; to intersect; to mix
①擰，扭緊，擠壓：絞車。絞痛。絞心。絞腸痧(霍亂病的俗稱)。絞盡心力。
②用繩子把人勒死：絞刑。絞殺。
③纏繞：絞纏。絞結。
④量詞，用於紗或毛線等。

Heisig: Thread . . . mingle.
Chinese: Spiderman hates going to parties and having to mingle. He wants to wring someone's neck after just a little small talk.
koohii1: Spiderman hates going to parties and having to mingle. He wants to strangle someone after just a little small talk.
koohii2: At the elegant cocktail party of VIP's, the spy, dressed like everyone else in formal evening wear, sneaks in and strangles his victim with a very thin wire - a thread. Afterwards he mingles in with the crowd and disappears.
Meaning: wring
Hanzi: 绞
Story: Whenver spidey mingles at a party he gets sick of people quickly and just wants to wring everyone's neck.
Kind: traditional

絞る(しぼる): press, wring, squeeze

從「 糸 」，「 交 」聲。本義是兩股或多股綫相交扭結而成的繩索。《禮記．雜記上》：「環絰」，孔穎達疏：「知以一股所謂纏絰者，若是兩股相交，則謂之絞。」《儀禮．喪服．子夏傳》：「絞帶者，繩帶也。」《玉篇．交部》：「絞，絢絞，繩索也。」 「 絞 」表示絞殺，即以繩索交勒脖子使人窒息。《說文》：「絞，縊也。」如《左傳．哀公二年》：「若其有罪，絞縊以戮。」《戰國策．秦策五》：「應侯欲伐趙，武安君難之，去咸陽七里，絞而殺之。」「 絞 」在隋唐時期成為死刑之一。《隋書．刑法志》：「其刑名有五：一曰死刑二，有絞，有斬。」《唐律．死刑二．絞斬疏議》：「絞、斬之坐，刑之極也。」 「 絞 」表示纏繞。《玉篇．糸部》：「絞，繞也。」如《墨子．節葬下》：「葛以緘之，絞之不合。」唐代柳宗元〈晉問〉：「晉之北山有異材……根絞怪石，不土而植，千尋百圍，與石同色。」 「 絞 」從纏繞義引申表示擠壓、擰。如《關尹子．二柱》：「木之為物鑽之得火，絞之得水。」北魏賈思勰《齊民要術．種棗》：「生布絞取濃汁，塗盤上或盆中。」 「 絞 」又表示急切。如《論語．陽貨》：「好直不好學，其蔽也絞。」邢昺疏：「絞者，絞切也。」《左傳．昭公元年》：「叔孫絞而婉。」杜預注：「絞，切也。」 「 絞 」還表示蒼黃色。《集韻．爻韻》：「絞，蒼黃色。」《禮記．王藻》：「絞衣以裼之。」鄭玄注：「絞，蒼黃之色也。」《後漢書．文苑列傳》：「諸史過者，皆令脫其故衣，更著岑牟單絞之服。」 「 絞 」也是古國名，在今湖北省鄖縣西北。《左傳．桓公十一年》：「鄖人軍於蒲騷，將與隨、絞、州、蓼伐楚師。」《左傳．桓公十二年》：「伐絞之役，楚師分涉於彭。」

絞字的基本解释

絞
jiǎo
见“绞”。

絞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎo］
［《廣韻》古巧切，上巧，見。］
“绞1”的繁体字。“校3”的被通假字。
(1)用两股以上条状物拧成一根绳索。
(2)引申指几种东西扭在一起。
(3)挤压；拧。
(4)缠绕。
(5)旧时死刑的一种。缢死；勒死。
(6)急切。
(7)犹搅。
(8)量词。用于成绞之物。
(9)古国名。故地在湖北省郧县西北。
[②]［xiáo］
［《集韻》何交切，平爻，匣。］
“绞2”的繁体字。
(1)苍黄色。
(2)借指苍黄色单衣。
(3)古代丧礼中敛尸用的束带。

絞字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絞； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页922第21
【廣韻】【正韻】古巧切【集韻】吉巧切，?音狡。【說文】縊也。【玉篇】繞也。【廣韻】縛也。【左傳·哀三年】若其有罪，絞縊以戮。【註】絞，所以縊人物。　又【論語】直而無禮則絞。【何晏註】絞，絞剌也。【疏】絞，剌人之非也。　又國名。【左傳·桓十一年】鄭人軍于蒲騷。將與隨、絞、州、蓼伐楚師。【註】絞，國名。　又姓。【廣韻】出《何氏姓苑》。　又【集韻】【韻會】?何交切，音爻。【禮·玉藻】絞衣以裼之。【註】絞，蒼黃之色也。　又【禮·喪大記】小斂布絞。【註】絞，旣斂所用束堅之者也。【釋名】已衣所以束之曰絞。絞，交也，交結之也。　又【集韻】居效切，音敎。繒黑黃色。

[①]［jiǎo］
["Guangyun" Gu Qiao cut, Shang Qiao, see you. ]
The traditional characters of "Screw 1". "School 3" was passed falsely.
(1) Use two or more strands to twist into a rope.
(2) By extension, several things are twisted together.
(3) Squeeze; twist.
(4) Winding.
(5) A kind of old death penalty. Hanged to death; strangled to death.
(6) Urgent.
(7) Still disturbed.
(8) Quantifiers. Used for twisted things.
(9) Ancient country name. The hometown is in the northwest of Yunxian County, Hubei Province.
[②]［xiáo］
["Ji Yun" He cross-cut, flat line, box. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "Screw 2".
(1) Pale yellow.
(2) By referring to pale yellow single clothes.
(3) Girdle used for gathering corpses in ancient funerals.

Name meaning

jiǎo
вм. 绞
Radicals: 糸, 交  (thread, mix)
Meaning Mnemonic
A thread is mixed all around and begins to strangle you.
Just imagine thread everywhere, mixing in with everything. It's all around, and no matter where you go you get more and more caught in this thread. Eventually it tightens because you're trying to escape, and you feel yourself having trouble breathing. Imagine the moment when you realize you're getting strangled.
Reading Mnemonic
As you are strangled you see who set this trap. (What else could it be, with all this thread everywhere?) It is こういち, who just watches you as you lose consciousness, tapping his fingers together.
In your final moments before you are totally strangled, you think you see a little thread come out of his butt. "I should have done my WaniKani reviews" is your last thought.
